channel.title: moderator on The TechGlider
channel.description: Recent content in moderator on The TechGlider

item.title: The TechGlider Forums are now active.
item.description: I am glad to inform you that finally the The TechGlider Forums have been activated on techglider.in. :-) To visit the forums you can go to http://forums.techglider.in. Please read the first topic “General Rules” before posting anything on the forums. You can register yourself on the forums by clicking on the “Register” link at the top-right of the page. After you become a member, you can ask questions, get answers, start new topics for discussions under the given categories and post about anything you like.
